CONTACT.WE: We are a group of developers constantly working to improve Omniwallet.
CONTACT.QUESTIONS: If you have any questions, issues or just want to provide some general feedback feel free to reach out to us at:
CONTACT.GITHUBDESC: Search/see our 'Open Issues' and what we are 'Actively Working' on now. Don't see your specific topic? We encourage you to open a new issue to let us know. (Please include as many details as possible including
CONTACT.GITHUBLINK: the output of the developer console
CONTACT.TALKDESC: This is a support knowledge base where you can review common topics, post questions asking for help or help answer other users questions
CONTACT.EMAILDESC: You can also reach us directly at
CONTACT.EMAILLINK: the output of the developer console
CONTACT.CHATDESC: Chat with the developers, share your ideas or ask questions. Availability varies, but we should generally be around Mon-Fri 9-5 CDT
CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us

FOUNDATION.TITLE: Omni Foundation
FOUNDATION.FIRST: In September 2013, the Mastercoin Foundation was formed to temporarily manage the funds in the Exodus Address and the distribution of the development MSC. The board of the Mastercoin Foundation has declared its intention to minimize its temporary central role by transitioning the decision making to Mastercoin owners through proof of stake voting.
FOUNDATION.SECOND: In January 2016 the Mastercoin Foundation was rebranded to the Omni Foundation and the primary tokens of the project, MSC, where renamed to OMNI. The Foundation advocates for the use of the Omni Protocol and tries to build a community of people who develop it. All budget items, board minutes, Dev OMNI vesting schedule, and bounties are public record and available to anyone on the

PROTOCOL.TITLE: Omni Protocol
PROTOCOL.PARAGRAPH: The Omni Protocol is a communications protocol that uses the Bitcoin block chain to enable features such as smart contracts, user currencies and decentralized peer-to-peer exchanges. A common analogy that is used to describe the relation of the Omni Protocol to Bitcoin is that of HTTP to TCP/IP: HTTP, like the Omni Protocol, is the application layer to the more fundamental transport and internet layer of TCP/IP, like Bitcoin. For more in-depth information and details see the

TOKEN.TITLE: Omnis
TOKEN.FIRST: Omnis (symbol OMNI) are digital tokens that are necessary for the use of some features of the Omni Protocol. The total number of Omnis in existence is 619,478.6 and no more MSC will ever be created. Additionally, Omnis can not be mined into existence. The 619,478.6 OMNI were generated as a result of a public fundraiser in the style of Kickstarter.com.

OMNIWALLET.TITLE: About Omniwallet
OMNIWALLET.AIM: Omniwallet is a new type of web wallet which aims to combine security, usability and multi-currency support.

SECURITY.TITLE: Best in class security
SECURITY.KEYS: Private keys are never sent to the server except in an encrypted form
SECURITY.OPEN: Everything is open source from the ground up!
SECURITY.REPLICATE: You can deploy the Omniwallet on your own server and host your own instance, or use one of the service providers that will host it for you - your money, your choice

USABILITY.TITLE: Baked in usability
USABILITY.ONLINE: No software to download or install, no blockchain to synchronize and verify - it just works, lightning fast
USABILITY.PLANNED: Carefully planned layout, with common operations emphasized
USABILITY.SPECIAL: Special care is taken to smooth out operational edge cases to prevent mistakes and ensure a painless experience for the user

MULTICURRENCY.TITLE: Multi-currency support
MULTICURRENCY.BUILT: Omniwallet comes with a pre-built support for Bitcoin, Omni and Test Omni
MULTICURRENCY.SUPPORT: Native support for Smart Property and User-Generated Currencies
MULTICURRENCY.ALT: Alt-coin support  - Omniwallet has plans to support coins that go outside of the usual Omni ecosystem, such as Litecoin, Peercoin and more

STATUS.TITLE: Current Status
STATUS.SPEED: Omniwallet is in full-speed development. Our vision and goal are well defined, and we are working hard to develop the functionality and continually improve the features
STATUS.INVOLVEMENT: We would like to get your involvement in the development effort! So go ahead and:
STATUS.SUGGESTIONS: Play around with it and give us suggestions
STATUS.CODE: Code up and send in pull requests that fix some of these issues
STATUS.SUBMIT: so please be sure to submit any contribution you make to the bounty thread.
STATUS.MEAN: What does this mean? We strive to make sure the features available are working as expected, however
STATUS.VALUE: when working with anything of substantial value.

DETAILS.SUBTITLE: 智能资产描述
DETAILS.URL_HINT: 输入相关网址以帮助用户了解更多关于智能资产的信息

CROWDSALE.TITLE: 发起众筹
CROWDSALE.SUBTITLE: 众筹详情
CROWDSALE.FORISSUER_TOOLTIP: Additional percentage created and credited to the issuing address based on the amount created and credited for each investment. Ex:With Percentage to issuer = 10, an investment that credits 100 tokens to an investment will also credit 10 tokens to the issuer.
CROWDSALE.EARLYBONUS_TOOLTIP: Bonus percentage created and credited to each investor for each week (7 days) before the deadline (calculated to the second). Ex:With Weekly early bird bonus percentage = 10, a participant investing 14 days before the deadline will get approx 20% bonus. An investor investing with 10 days left will get approx 14% bonus.
CROWDSALE.EARLYESTIMATE_TOOLTIP: Estimate based on the crowdsale creation being confirmed in the blockchain within 30 minutes after it was calculated.

TRANSACTION.CLOSED: Crowdsale was closed from further investments

DETAILS.CURRENTBONUS: 目前早期参与众筹者的优惠
DETAILS.NOTOKENS: 您不拥有此次众筹的令牌
DETAILS.LOGIN: 您需要登录或者创建钱包以便于参与众筹
